infoSections.text: C++ is a high-performance, general-purpose programming language that extends C by adding object-oriented, generic, and functional programming features. It is widely used for system programming, game development, real-time applications, embedded systems, and high-performance computing. C++ offers fine control over memory and hardware, making it suitable for applications requiring efficiency and speed.

tasks.taskDescription: Sign up for this [course] to understand the basics of C++ and follow along. While this course is introductory, it will give you an understanding of the language you will be using. Submit a screenshot of completion and a screenshot of one of the projects within the course. If you are proficient in C++, submit a screenshot of a previous project as a replacement.
